page.title: 13CHURCH AND CHAPEL
page.content: I go to{Chapel}Sunday School every week. We go at 10 o' clock. In March we take a{Scripture exam.}On June the 16th (which was Father's Day) we held our{Anniversary}when all the children said poems,and did a play to the song "Streets of London." On the 30th of June we held our{Festival}of{Queens} which is when {Sunday School Queens {from the area get}together in our Chapel. On that particular day we had orange and biscuits afterwards. There is a{service}at Church at 10 o'clock and 6.30 and every first Sunday in the month one at 8.00 in the morning. Sometimes there is a service at Thorpe instead of Harthill. If it is a special day there is refreshments afterwards in the Church room. In the morning it is{Communion}and sometimes Sunday School come in and sing songs .
